Name: Average time from \Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE\ to \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average time between \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ and \Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE\ for re-submission
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average resolution time for cases involving \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER occurs

Name: Total time spent in \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Average time from \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ to \Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION\ in cases of re-submission
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of cases with \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ compared to cases without this activity
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER occurs

Name: Minimum time it takes for a declaration to be re-submitted after being \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time for a declaration to move from \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ to \Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR\
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time declarations spend in the process after being \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ before \Request Payment\
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average waiting time before \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ after \Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE\
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average time it takes from \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ to the next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER occurs

Name: Total time it takes for cases with \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ to reach \Payment Handled\ compared to cases without this activity
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum resolution time of cases with \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ compared to the overall minimum resolution time
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Average time from \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ to \Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER\ in cases of successful re-approval
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Total time spent in activities between \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ and \Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR\
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
